description:
A member in Germany emailed me asking if I was ever going to release a Bonus scene that was on Edge, Vol. 3 of me and Vance. He is a fan of Vance, but can't seem to find a retailer in Germany.
I guess after almost 1500 videos I have lost track of some of these scenes, and didn't even realize that I hadn't added it to the site. It is a balance trying to hold Bonus material for DVD buyers, but like to also like to eventually air these scenes for loyal members too.
It was a fun video to shoot. Not anything crazy going on, but still fun to see Vance looking hairy and bound up in the Edge chair.
There are couple videos airing in the next week or two of me interacting with Delaney and also a full-sex video with Ransom. So it might seem a bit much to be airing this video now, but I wanted to get it online ASAP.
Anyway, hope you enjoy this impromptu airing of this Bonus scene!
title: Bryan & Vance - Edge
